name: Loud Cloud the Desert Rains Serpent
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 FIRE and 1 WIND monster from your GY. You can banish 1 FIRE monster from your GY; Add 1 WIND monster from your Deck to your Hand, and if it is a Reptile monster, Special Summon that card, ignoring Summoning Conditions. You can banish 1 WIND monster in your GY; shuffle your banished cards into your Deck, then draw 1 card. You can banish 1 FIRE and 1 WIND monster in your GY; banish all non-reptile monsters on the field. You can only use each effect of "Loud Cloud the Desert Rains" once per turn.
